item.title: What is Cloud Native, really?
item.description: This is one of those topics where everyone seems to have a slightly different view and most of them are valid. That’s the beauty of computer science: there’s rarely a single right answer. You’ve probably come across some of the many answers out there, and I won’t dive into all of them here. It’s simply too much to cover in a single article. I want to share my perspective here. For other viewpoints, you can explore online resources and read different takes on the subject.
